snippet: We find in our Western papers an eloquent letter from Hon. SAMUEL F. VINTON, in replay to an invitation to attend the opening excursion of the Cincinnati and Dayton Railroad. The letter closes with the following eloquent passage....
lead_paragraph: We find in our Western papers an eloquent letter from Hon. SAMUEL F. VINTON, in replay to an invitation to attend the opening excursion of the Cincinnati and Dayton Railroad. The letter closes with the following eloquent passage.

headline.main: Letter from Samuel F. Vinton--Division of the Union.
